title: Tasty tuna burgers
description: These tasty tuna burgers are a doddle to prepare and full of flavour. Serve with salad for a simple supper. Try the Eat Well for Less quiz to find out how you could cut your food bills.

default: 4 x 160g tins tuna in water, drained and flaked
salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Mix the tuna, breadcrumbs, eggs, mayonnaise, spring onions and garlic together in a bowl. Season with salt and pepper.
Divide the mixture into 8 and shape into patties. Cover and place in the fridge for 10 minutes.
Heat the oil in a large frying pan over a medium-high heat. Cook the burgers in batches for 2 minutes on each side, or until well browned and cooked through. Serve immediately.
